thread.title: Amateur photgrapher
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Amateur photgrapher

author: Amateur photgrapher
title: Amateur photgrapher
text: Normally I like to buy local, brick and mortar. But B&H is the exception I make because they simply always have what I need, provide great service, add value through their knowledge, and in the rare instance of a return always make it easy. Thanks B&H.
